.if($account.is-domain-admin, equal, true)

Admin

Review Comments Needing Approval
.else() .if($account.is-moderator, equal, true)

Moderator

Review Comments Needing Approval
.end() .end() .if($account, equal, nil)

.else()

.end()

Welcome to Swiftfire & Jekyll!

None

Browser information:

This website uses CSS3 & HTML5. It is recommended to use a modern browser with at least the following version number:

  • Chrome 29.0
  • Edge 12.0
  • Explorer 11.0

Review Comments for Approval

.if($account, nil) .assign(illegal, true) .else() .if($account.is-moderator, true) .assign(illegal, false) .else() .if($account.is-domain-admin, true) .assign(illegal, false) .else() .assign(illegal, true) .end() .end() .end()

.if($info.illegal, true)

Insufficient acces rights, please login with an administrator or moderator account

.else() .setup(first-comment-to-approve)

.if($info.none, true)

There are no comments waiting for approval


.else()

Comment by: .show($info.dname)

.show($info.html)

Note: 'Reject' is final.

The original text may be modified below:

Note: 'Preview' updates the original comment.

.end(if-else-info-none)

.end(if-illegal)

Browser information:

This website uses CSS3 & HTML5. It is recommended to use a modern browser with at least the following version number:

  • Chrome 29.0
  • Edge 12.0
  • Explorer 11.0
  • Firefox 28.0
  • Safari 9.0
  • Opera 17.0

Problems? please contact me.
